overview:
Melanie provides support to our CFO. She was previously a first grade teacher for the Lenoir County Public Schools in Kinston, North Carolina. She served as the grade level chairperson and helped develop the math curriculum for all first grade classes in the county. Prior to her work in Kinston, she was a student at East Carolina University, in Greenville, North Carolina, where she earned a Bachelor of Science in Education, with a concentration in Math and Child Development.

Melanieâ€™s background also includes administrative support for John J. McMullen Associates, a national naval/marine engineering firm, located in Alexandria, VA.
